snippet: As Investors assess Greece’s appeal for a more generous bailout, energy stocks were among the biggest decliners as the price of oil, once again, fell.
abstract: Stocks close flat after largely quiet trading, with investors awaiting news from emergency meeting about Greek finances.
lead_paragraph: As Investors assess Greece’s appeal for a more generous bailout, energy stocks were among the biggest decliners as the price of oil, once again, fell.

headline.main: Shares Show Little Change As Investors Look to Greece
headline.print_headline: Shares Show Little Change as Investors Look to Greece
